All Classes

  • All Classes Interface Summary Class Summary Enum Summary Exception Summary 
    Class Description
    AudioRepository
    An AudioRepository provides a central repository for acquiring audio files.
    BackgroundDelegate
    A BackgroundDelegate follows the Delegate pattern and embraces Composition over Inheritence.
    Bounded
    Implementing this interface exposes the getBounds method, which returns the bounds, aka Bounding Box, of this Entity.
    Clearable
    Denote that this Object can be cleared.
    Collidable
    A Collidable is a composite interface that is both a Collider and a Collided.
    Collided
    A Collided represents a Entity that can be collided with by a Collider
    Collider  
    CollisionDelegate
    A CollisionDelegate handles all behavior related to Object collisions.
    CollisionSide  
    Configurable
    Implementing Configurable denotes the Object can, and usually must, be configured before it can be used.
    Debugger
    The Debugger is used to gather and show in game debug information.
    DebugGridPaneFactory
    A DebugGridPaneFactory should be used for creating instances of GridPane for use in the Debugger.
    DebugLabelFactory
    A value shown in the Debugger.
    Destroyable
    Denote that this Object is Destroyable and hence ensures maximum Objects eligible for Garbage Collection.
    DynamicScene
    Instantiate a new DynamicScene.
    Entity
    An Entity will serve as the Root Interface for all objects that are part of a Yaeger game.
    EntityCollection
    An EntityCollection encapsulates all behaviour related to all instances of Entity that are part of a YaegerScene.
    EntityCollectionFactory
    A EntityCollectionFactory can be used to create instances of EntityCollection.
    EntityCollectionStatistics
    An EntityCollectionStatistics is a DTO (Data Transfer Object) that contains all current values from an EntityCollection.
    EntitySpawner
    An EntitiySpawner is the abstract superclass that should be extended to create an object that spawns a subclass of Entity.
    EntitySupplier
    An EntitySupplier encapsulates a HashSet of instances of Entity.s
    EventTypes
    EventTypes contains all available custom Events.
    ImageFactory
    An ImageFactory should be used for creating instance of Image.
    ImagePatternFactory
    An ImagePatternFactory should be used for creating instance of ImagePattern.
    ImageRepository
    An ImageRepository provides a central repository for acquiring sprites.
    ImageViewFactory
    An ImageViewFactory should be used for creating instance of ImageView.
    Initializable
    Stating an Object is Initializable exposes the init lifecycle hook.
    KeyListener
    A KeyListener is notified when the set of pressed keys changes.
    KeyListenerDelegate
    A KeyListenerDelegate follows the Delegate pattern and embraces Composition over Inheritence.
    MouseButtonListener
    Being a MouseButtonListener enables the Entity to be notified if a MouseButton has been clicked while the mouse pointer is on the Entity.
    Movement
    A Movement encapsulates both a direction and a speed.
    NodeProvider
    Being a NodeProvider guarantees that a Node can be provided.
    Position
    A 2D geometric point that represents the x, y coordinates.
    Removeable
    A Removeable denotes an Object, most likely an Entity, that is eligible for removance from its parent.
    RemoveEntityEvent
    Send a RemoveEntityEvent when a Removeable needs to be removed.
    ResourceConsumer
    Implementing a ResourceConsumer exposes a default methode that can be used to acquire the absolute path to a resource available on the class path.
    SceneBorder  
    SceneBoundaryCrosser  
    SceneBoundaryCrossingDelegate
    A SceneBoundaryCrossingDelegate holds all responsibility for checking if the Scene boundary has been crossed.
    SceneBoundaryCrossingDelegateFactory
    A SceneBoundaryCrossingDelegateFactory can be used to create instances of SceneBoundaryCrossingDelegate.
    SceneFactory
    A SceneFactory can be used to create instances of Scene.
    Scenes
    A Scenes contains all instances of YaegerScene that are part of the Game.
    SceneType
    Beschikbare SceneTypes voor een implementatie van een YaegerScene.
    Size
    A 2D geometric box that represents a bounding box.
    SoundClip
    A SoundClip encapsulates a mp3 audio file.
    SpriteAnimationDelegate
    A SpriteAnimationDelegate holds all responsibility related to Sprites that contain multiple images.
    SpriteAnimationDelegateFactory  
    SpriteEntity
    A SpriteEntity is a Entity that is represented by an Image.
    StaticScene  
    StatisticsObserver
    A StatisticsObserver will function as the Observer from the Observable-pattern, for changes in the EntityCollectionStatistics.
    TextEntity
    A TextEntity can be used to display a line of text on a YaegerScene.
    Updatable
    Implement this interface to be updated every cycle of the game loop.
    UpdatableSpriteEntity
    An UpdatableSpriteEntity extends all behaviour of a SpriteEntity, but also implements the Updatable Interface.
    YaegerEngine
    YaegerEngine is de basis-superklasse die ge-extend moet worden.
    YaegerLifecycleException
    A YaegerLifecycleException indicates that a method is called that does not abide the lifecycle of Yaeger.
    YaegerModule  
    YaegerResourceNotAvailableException
    A YaegerResourceNotAvailableException is thrown when a Resource is requested, but not available on the classpath.
    YaegerScene
    A YaegerScene encapsulates a scene or level from a Yaeger Game.
    YaegerSceneNotAvailableException
    A YaegerSceneNotAvailableException is thrown when a YaegerScene is requested that is not available.
